China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 26 日星期一 10:57:05 GMT 120
Chinese banks' dollar purchases via swaps from clients hit record high in JanChinese banks purchased the most dollars from their clients via FX swaps in January, official data from the FX regulator showed on Monday, suggesting exporters preferred to only temporarily acquire the local currency while holding on to dollars. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 10:33:24 GMT MBO2PQ5PLJM7ZAKQJXBVMO5FGE https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/chinese-banks-dollar-purchases-via-swaps-clients-hit-record-high-jan-2024-02-26/Reuters市场货币
China's homegrown C919 jet lands in Vietnam after Singapore AirshowChina's homegrown C919 passenger jet, manufactured by Commercial Aviation Corp of China (COMAC), landed in Vietnam on Monday, its second international destination after Singapore, Chinese state television CCTV reported. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 10:07:27 GMT VQ6KS32LHNKIZAVFPNEI2UI3PU https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/chinas-homegrown-c919-jet-lands-vietnam-after-singapore-airshow-2024-02-26/Sophie Yu, Brenda Goh商业航空航天与国防
SAIC's MG unveils MG3 hybrid model for European marketMG Motors, a unit of China's SAIC on Monday unveiled its hybrid hatchback MG3 model for the European market, taking advantage of slowing growth demand for electric vehicles by offering a lower-emission model without the need for charging. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:37:10 GMT 7K4EZXYI6JNLRDTAHVZV3QBLAE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/saics-mg-unveils-mg3-hybrid-model-european-market-2024-02-26/Gilles Guillaume商业汽车与交通
Chinese companies axe IPO plans amid listing scrutinyCompanies have scrambled to scuttle plans for initial public offering in China this year as the securities watchdog tightens rules on share listings in a bearish market. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:10:26 GMT M5MZRSOA7ZJPBMLR4LK7CX7S2U https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/chinese-companies-axe-ipo-plans-amid-listing-scrutiny-2024-02-26/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
China hits back at US, EU, UK for Russia-related curbs on its companiesChina firmly opposes the decisions of Britain, the European Union and the United States to impose sanctions on its companies for Russia-related reasons, its commerce ministry said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 07:52:51 GMT YYP3MKZIWJJHDA55HJLGK6366M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-opposes-us-sanctions-chinese-companies-Russia-lated-reasons-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中国
Exclusive: Satellite images reveal floating barrier at mouth of disputed atoll in South China SeaSatellite images of the hotly disputed Scarborough Shoal in the South China Sea show a new floating barrier across its entrance, near where Philippine ships and China coast guard vessels have had frequent run-ins. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 07:42:04 GMT ZN2XEXDFRZM7BLA65BNKFX7GY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/satellite-images-reveal-floating-barrier-mouth-disputed-atoll-south-china-sea-2024-02-26/Greg Torode, Karen Lema世界亚太地区
